sqlMap.select:
select b.* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from ( select unq, title, name, hits, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from board
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc) a) b where rn >= #startIndex# and rn <= #endIndex#

select count(*) total from board
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
select unq,title,name,content,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from board where unq=#unq#
